title: Knolly Tyaughton adds Titanium and Steel options for a 150mm hardcore hardtail
content:
The Knolly Tyaughton is their all-new hardcore hardtail. Why hardcore? Because of its progressive trail riding appropriate geometry and 150-160mm travel fork. It rolls on a 29″ wheelset with a 64.5° head angle and tire clearance aplenty, making it a worthy weapon for weathering steep, loamy hillsides this winter. Complete bike pricing starts at $3599

The post Knolly Tyaughton adds Titanium and Steel options for a 150mm hardcore hardtail appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
